roles.title: Sr. Applied Machine Learning Scientist | Recommendation Systems
highlights: Architected and deployed production-scale agentic AI systems using LangGraph and RAG pipelines supporting 3,000+ employees with 95% retrieval accuracy.
Built enterprise upselling platform analyzing 10M+ SKU combinations using product association mining and LLM-based semantic verification.
Optimized Whisper-based ASR pipeline, improving accuracy by 15% for 140K+ customer calls enabling automated lead extraction.
Led technical execution across two major ML initiatives and mentored 2 data engineers on VoC + LLM chatbot systems.

roles.title: Applied Machine Learning Scientist | Recommendation Systems
highlights: Engineered ML pipelines for 5.9M+ chats and 140K+ calls with transformer-based summarization achieving <100ms latency.
Designed signal-based customer scoring for 2.9K+ enterprise accounts using Snowflake and Python.
Built automated trigger and sales-engagement system leveraging account intelligence.

roles.title: Applied Machine Learning Intern | Recommendation Systems
highlights: Developed Autoencoder-LSTM hybrid model for customer segment prediction analyzing 63M datapoints.
Delivered personalized product recommendations with 18% lift in conversion.

roles.title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning | Dell Financial Services (DFS)
highlights: Designed production anomaly detection system for contract fraud reducing false positives by 40%.
Built real-time explainability infrastructure using SHAP with CI/CD and monitoring pipelines.

projects.title: NeuroCognitive Modular AI System — Human Cognition Emulation using LLMs + GANs
highlights: Architected multi-agent system combining GANs + LLMs for creative reasoning and emotion modeling.
Designed modules for reasoning (LLaMA/Gemini), creativity (Stable Diffusion), and persistent memory via FAISS.
Implemented orchestration layer enabling contextual multi-turn interactions.
